page.title: 20IMPROVING CARCROFT
page.content: Forty, eight and nine year olds were given the following to discuss;If you had a million pounds what would you spend it on to benefit the Carcroft community?From the general comments made it was concluded that Carcroft could do with a Community Centre which should have the following facilities;A nursery for all babies.A theatre and cinema. An adventure playground.A new Sunday school. A leisure centre with water sport facilities.A campsite for tents. An animal centre with open park land and gardens.Comments from the children about things they felt they needed included;"More telephone boxes." "Better roads.""A place where anyone could meet for coffee.""More shops and factories so that people have work."
